changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la replanificati: Fixed a bug when rescheduling sunrise/sunset
changelog.md.Utilisation d'une nouvelle source de don: Use of a new data source, no need for an account on your side, everything goes through the Jeedom cloud
changelog.md.Le plugin utilisant une nouvelle sources: The plugin uses a new data source (via the jeedom cloud) it is possible that certain commands change (or no longer exist) and that new ones are created
changelog.md.En cas de soucis il est recommandé de su: In case of problems, it is recommended to delete the weather equipment and create new ones
changelog.md.Révision des templates de widgets deskto: Revision of desktop widget templates in pure javascript
changelog.md.Suite à cette mise à jour, il sera néces: Following this update, it will be necessary to reconfigure the equipment
changelog.md.afin de renseigner les latitudes et long: in order to provide the latitudes and longitudes of the place whose meteorological information is to be retrieved
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le déclenchement d: Bug fix on sunrise / sunset trigger
changelog.md.Correction de bug des widgets en v4: Bug fix for widgets in v4

index.md.permet de récupérer les données météorol: allows you to retrieve meteorological data from one or more cities
index.md.Le rafraîchissement de ces données s'eff: This data is refreshed every 30 minutes
index.md.Suite a la configuration et l'activation: Following the configuration and activation of the equipment, it is absolutely necessary to launch a manual data update for the plugin to update or wait 30min for the automatic update
index.md.Ce plugin ne nécessite pas de configurat: This plugin does not require any special configuration and simply needs to be activated after installation
index.md.Les équipements Météo sont accessibles à: Weather equipment is accessible from the menu
index.md.permet d'ajouter un nouvel équipement Mé: allows you to add a new Weather equipment
index.md.En cliquant sur un équipement, on arrive: Clicking on a device takes you directly to its configuration page
index.md.Indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: Indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.Permet de choisir la catégorie de l'équi: Allows you to choose the category of the equipment
index.md.Permet de rendre l'équipement actif: Allows you to make the equipment active
index.md.Cocher la case permet d'afficher toutes: Checking the box allows you to display all weather information on mobiles
index.md.Cocher la case pour afficher des images: Check the box to display images instead of icons on the widget
index.md.Il faudra ensuite renseigner les coordon: You will then need to enter the GPS coordinates of the place from which you wish to retrieve the weather information
index.md.Latitude du lieu dont vous souhaitez réc: Latitude of the place whose weather you want to retrieve
index.md.Longitude du lieu dont vous souhaitez ré: Longitude of the place whose weather you want to retrieve
index.md.on retrouve la liste de toutes les comma: we find the list of all the commands available as well as the possibility of logging the numerical values
index.md.la signification des differents code mét: the meaning of the different weather codes
